title: Stocks Slide as Banks Weigh, Tech Weakness Persists | Closing Bell
description: Comprehensive cross-platform coverage of the U.S. market close on Bloomberg Television, Bloomberg Radio, and YouTube with Romaine Bostick, David Gura, Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
